comments.raw_text:
This bug is to record an analysis of the reasons for failures in AudioWorklet tests at https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/file/17e3c9ff2cad9711445a6c39df85925c8f347336/testing/web-platform/tests/webaudio/the-audio-api/the-audioworklet-interface

The failures fit in these categories:
* Errors in the tests related a [bug in the Chrome implementation's number of input channels for inactive input](https://github.com/WebAudio/web-audio-api/issues/2177).
* Features independent from AudioWorklet which are not implemented: [automationRate](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1504984) and [offline suspend](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1265406).
* An existing [bug related to AudioBufferSourceNode](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=916392#c12).
